title: Schedule Preventive Maintenance on Asset
description: A public works manager is scheduling annual preventive maintenance for a city-owned HVAC unit.

tasks.description: Identify the HVAC unit in the asset management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager locates the correct asset record.

tasks.description: Review the manufacturer's recommended maintenance schedule.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager confirms the required annual maintenance tasks.

tasks.description: Create a work order for the internal maintenance crew to perform the service.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager successfully creates and assigns the preventive maintenance work order.
